doc.title: Earth to Kids: A Guide to Products for a Healthy Planet
doc.plot: Engages young audiences with humorous characters skits and characters such as "The Tooth Fairy" which encourages use of the tube toothpaste over the pump toothpaste, "The One-timers" about a family that never recycles, and "A Plain Ordinary Sandwich" to compare the amount of trash different food products generate. The recycling information covered includes the path of a recycled aluminum can, children's opinions on garbage, and the phrase "if you can't reuse it, refuse it".
